content: double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 1 repeat from * three times double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 space slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space to next chain-3 space work 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space to next chain-3 space work 3 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space to next chain-3 space work 2 double_crochet chain 3 1 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space to next chain-3 space work 1 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in last double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg chain-3 round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 sts treble_crochet in next 7 sts 2 treble_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain-3 space double_crochet in next 12 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 treble_crochet in next chain-3 space treble_crochet in next 7 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain-3 space double_crochet in next 13 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain-3 space double_crochet in next 3 sts join with slip_stitch in beg chain-3 fasten yarn round 5 holding square upside down attach red yarn to first double_crochet of the 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet corner chain 4 cluster chain 3 cluster in chain-3 space chain 1 skip next double_crochet * double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * seven times cluster chain 3 cluster in chain-3 space chain 1 skip next double_crochet * double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 repeat from * seven times continue around square in this manner join with slip_stitch to third chain of beg chain-4 fasten yarn © 2007 beverly button http //www
